lead_paragraph: The network, owned by Disney, says that the carrier’s new FiOS cable packages violate its contract.

headline.print_headline: ESPN Sues Verizon Over Customized FiOS Cable Packages
headline.main: ESPN Sues Verizon Over New Cable Packages

snippet: The network, owned by Disney, says that the carrier’s new FiOS cable packages violate its contract.
abstract: ESPN files suit against Verizon in New York Supreme Court over introduction by Verizon of new cable package that separates channels into smaller, category-specific groups.
